Injury Kit Otherwise referred to as a "Surgery kit", this collection of medical tools and remedies can be used to treat ailments of all kinds; magic is less common than a tourniquet after all. With a successful Medicine Check this injury kit can be used to treat Injuries. Operate Deafened A deafened creature can't hear and automatically fails any Ability Checks that requires hearing. Exhaustion Exhaustion has 7 levels, with each getting progressively worse than the last. Levels of Exhaustion induced by an injury may not be able to be removed through rest, in such cases refer to your specific Injuries on how to heal your Restless Exhaustion.
The levels are as follows: - Exhaustion: Level 1 - Exhaustion: Level 2 - Exhaustion: Level 3 - Exhaustion: Level 4 - Exhaustion: Level 5 - Exhaustion: Level 6 - Exhaustion: Level 7 Exhaustion: Level 1 Unrestable Exhaustion: Level 1 You are exhausted. At the end of your turn you must succeed a Constitution or Charisma DC 5 Saving Throw, whichever is higher, to resist the urge to sleep.
All Ability Scores are reduced by 1. Movement Speed cost is increased by 10%. Attacks against you have their Critical Hit threshold reduced by 1. Exhaustion: Level 2 Unrestable Exhaustion: Level 2 You are exhausted. At the end of your turn you must succeed a Constitution or Charisma DC 5 Saving Throw, whichever is higher, to resist the urge to sleep.
All Ability Scores are reduced by 2. Movement Speed cost is increased by 20%. Attacks against you have their Critical Hit threshold reduced by 1. All Ability Scores are reduced by 3. Movement Speed cost is increased by 30%. Attacks against you have their Critical Hit threshold reduced by 2. Exhaustion: Level 4 Unrestable Exhaustion: Level 4 You are exhausted. All Ability Scores are reduced by 4. Movement Speed cost is increased by 40%. Attacks against you have their Critical Hit threshold reduced by 2. All Ability Scores are reduced by 5. Movement Speed cost is increased by 50%. Attacks against you have their Critical Hit threshold reduced by 3. Exhaustion: Level 6 Unrestable Exhaustion: Level 6 You are exhausted. At the end of your turn you must succeed a Constitution or Charisma DC 15 Saving Throw, whichever is higher, to resist the urge to sleep.
All Ability Scores are reduced by 6. Movement Speed cost is increased by 60%. Attacks against you have their Critical Hit threshold reduced by 3. Exhaustion: Level 7 Unrestable Exhaustion: Level 7 You are exhausted. At the end of your turn you must succeed a Constitution or Charisma DC 15 Saving Throw, whichever is higher, to resist the urge to sleep.
All Ability Scores are reduced by 7. Movement Speed cost is increased by 70%. Attacks against you are guaranteed to be a Critical Hit. Injuries Injuries can be applied from many sources, be they severe or mild, ailing or easily remedied, the life of an adventurer, hero or villain is strife with dangers. Anosmia Injury: Anosmia -- Cold damage -- You lose your sense of smell and taste. You automatically fail any ability checks that involve your sense of smell or taste. The condition heals if you receive any magical healing. Anosmia is intended for Cold damage.
